actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To permit a State to provide disaster relief using amounts available to the State for a program or project if such amounts were specifically appropriated or otherwise made available to the State by a Federal statute, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits any State which is eligible to receive disaster relief under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to supplement such relief using amounts available for a program if such amounts were specifically made available to the State by a Federal statute and are used for purposes related to the program.

titles.title: To permit a State to provide disaster relief using amounts available to the State for a program or project if such amounts were specifically appropriated or otherwise made available to the State by a Federal statute, and for other purposes.
